price: 110. Ya sólo, ye ayebi polele ya maloba mpe maye bobombaka.
arabic: إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تَكۡتُمُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: innahu yaʿlamu al-jahra mina al-qawli wayaʿlamu mā taktumūna
